attributes.action: Review the system for calculating Mortgage interest rates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time that we stopped stabilising the economy by making it impossible for poor people to pay back their mortgages. It's time we found another way to stop the economy getting out of control. When people buy houses it is based on their financial situation at the time they buy, warning people that interest rates can go up is simply not acceptable. It is time for a new approach and a review of how inflation is calculated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
